name: Handling Time
description:
2D platformer, no pun intended. You are a time wizard, yet apprentice, who needs to save the world from catastrophe. Each -time- you attack a Temporal Orb, you switch between past and future. Be careful though, for many zones have not stayed the same through the ages!

Now go, and face the obstacles time puts upon you.

CONTROLS:

  • Up W 
  • Left A
  •  Down S 
  • Right D 
  • Jump Space
  • Attack E
  • Hook Q
  • Dash Shift
  • Charged Dash R
